column1: Smoque BBQ////I know that I'm not an expert on BBQ
column2: but I think I know a good rack of ribs when I taste one.  I ordered the baby back ribs
column5: and a side of the pulled pork.  The ribs were slightly overdone on one side
column6: and were not easy to pull apart...I don't know if this is supposed to be good or bad.  However when I bit into a few of the overdone side ribs
column9: and had a chalky taste.  I'm going to give this place another try
column10: but mark one down for the ribs.
